title: Scott Pilgrim vs The World (Expanded Fan Soundtrack)
description:
The official soundtrack was missing too many great songs, so i've brought them all together hopefully and put them in a chronological order. Any feedback or suggestions on anything missing and to add, are as always appreciated. Enjoy
